events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue involves a refund request because the customer received an incorrect item.
An agent has been assigned to handle this refund request issue for further assistance.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I will help you process your refund quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the mistake?
Here is my order number 7845123 and attached is a photo showing the wrong item I received instead of my original order.
Thanks for the info. We will issue a full refund immediately and arrange for you to return the wrong product at no cost.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. Thank you for making this so easy to fix!
The refund has been processed and return shipping label emailed. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and did not encounter any issues returning the product.
We are closing your case now as the refund was completed successfully. Thank you for your patience.
